bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Graphic Symbols for Grid and Mapping Diagrams Used in Cable Television Systems
IEEE Standard Graphic Symbols for Grid and Mapping Diagrams Used in Cable Television Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A list of graphic symbols for the designation of electrical, electronic, and pole line devices for layout drawings of cable television (CATV) systems is provided. This standard does not use reference designation and class designation letters.

A list of graphic symbols for the designation of electrical, electronic, and pole line devices for layout drawings of cable television (CATV) systems is provided. This standard does not use reference designation and class designation letters.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
